offers.title: Get 15% discount using HDFC Bank PayZapp Card
offers.subtitle: Use code PAYZAPP100 & get 15% discount up to Rs.100 on orders above Rs.250
tncs: Offer valid twice per user per month
Offer valid on a minimum cart value of Rs.250
Offer valid only on HDFC Bank PayZapp Prepaid Card
The maximum available discount per transaction is Rs.100
Other T&C's may apply
Offer valid till Sep 30, 2020 23:59 PM
